konaneCommon
Class Konane

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--konaneCommon.Konane
public class Konane
extends java.lang.Object

Container class for game constants and utility methods. The Konane class contains public constants and methods used in all game packages to validate and execute Moves, construct BoardGrids, and faciliate communication between the Konane client and server.

Version:
1.9, 1/7/2001
Author:
Paul Pham

Field Detail

BEGIN_TURN

public static final byte BEGIN_TURN
Bytecode for the server signaling a client to begin a turn.

BEGIN_TURN_ACK

public static final byte BEGIN_TURN_ACK
Bytecode for a client acknowledging a signal to begin a turn.

BLACK

public static final byte BLACK
Constant representing the black side in a game. Represents either the black player or a position on a BoardGrid occupied by a black token.

BLACK_PORT_NUMBER

public static final int BLACK_PORT_NUMBER
TCP port number used for communication between the server and the black client.

BOARD

public static final byte BOARD
Bytecode for the server sending BoardGrid dimensions to a client.

BOARD_ACK

public static final byte BOARD_ACK
Bytecode for the client acknowledging BoardGrid dimensions from the server.

BOARD_SYNC

public static final byte BOARD_SYNC
Bytecode for the server sending an entire BoardGrid to a client.

BOARD_SYNC_ACK

public static final byte BOARD_SYNC_ACK
Bytecode for a client acknowledging an entire BoardGrid from the server.

DISCONNECT

public static final byte DISCONNECT
Bytecode for either the client or the server requesting a disconnect.

END_TURN

public static final byte END_TURN
Bytecode for the server signaling a client to end a turn. This bytecode is only sent if a client's player has exceeded its time limit.

END_TURN_ACK

public static final byte END_TURN_ACK
Bytecode for a client acknowledging a signal to end a turn.

ERROR

public static final byte ERROR
Constant representing an invalid side. This value is returned if an invalid position is requested in a BoardGrid.

MAX_CLIENT_PACKET_LENGTH

public static final int MAX_CLIENT_PACKET_LENGTH
Maximum length in bytes of a packet from the client to the server.

MAX_COL

public static final byte MAX_COL
Maximum allowable number of columns in a board.

MAX_ROW

public static final byte MAX_ROW
Maximum allowable number of rows in a board.

MAX_SERVER_PACKET_LENGTH

public static int MAX_SERVER_PACKET_LENGTH
Maximum length in bytes of a packet from the server to the client.

MOVE

public static final byte MOVE
Bytecode for the server sending a Move to a client.

MOVE_ACK

public static final byte MOVE_ACK
Bytecode for a client acknolweding a Move from the server.

NAME

public static final byte NAME
Bytecode for the server sending player names to a client.

NAME_ACK

public static final byte NAME_ACK
Bytecode for a client acknowledging player names from the server.

NONE

public static final byte NONE
Constant representing no side. Represents an empty position on a BoardGrid.

RESET

public static final byte RESET
Bytecode for the server signaling a client to reset itself for a new game.

TIME

public static final byte TIME
Bytecode for the server sending player times from a client.

TIME_ACK

public static final byte TIME_ACK
Bytecode for a client acknowledging players times from the server.

TIMEOUT

public static final long TIMEOUT
Time in milliseconds that the server waits for a response from a client before aborting communications.

verbose

public static boolean verbose
Determines whether game error messages are displayed. If verbose is true, all game error messages (not just program errors) are printed to standard out and any GUI text areas in the server and clients.

WHITE

public static final byte WHITE
Constant representing the white side in a game. Represents either the white player or a position on a BoardGrid occupied by a white token.

WHITE_PORT_NUMBER

public static final int WHITE_PORT_NUMBER
TCP port number used for communication between the server and the white client.
Method Detail

sideToString

public static java.lang.String sideToString(byte side)
Translates a byte constant into a string.
WHITE => "WHITE"
BLACK => "BLACK"
NONE => "NONE"
Parameters:
side - One of the byte constants defined in Konane representing a side.
Returns:
The String representation of a byte constant representing a side.
